meta.article_title: March 15, 2021 - Do You Really Play the Middle?

play-middle.probleme: Lack of effective play to the middle
causes_communes: Misunderstanding what constitutes playing the middle

debutant: Start with short, controlled shots to the middle; focus on precise placement
intermediaire: Judge distances and angles better; aim for the middle as the ball reaches the opponent

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice controlled shots to the middle, adjusting distance and angle based on opponent's reaction.

metriques_progression: Aim for the middle; adjust shots based on opponent's reaction
erreurs_a_eviter: Playing too much to the corners; neglecting the middle as a viable target
